message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.HC, cs.IR 

The paper proposes a method for analyzing first- and third-person videos using deep learning techniques. The focus is on joint attention, which is a concept related to computer vision and human-computer interaction. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also mentions the use of a triplet loss, which is a common technique in deep learning for similarity learning, suggesting that cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a possible category. The paper also discusses the potential applications of the proposed method, including multimedia (cs.MM), human-computer interaction (cs.HC), and information retrieval (cs.IR).
